attributes.review: As someone who designs apps, this one it terribly made. The navigation is awkward. The data processing causes crashes. The overall look of this seems like a five year old decided to color on mommy’s walls. You’d think a multi billionaire could pay people well enough to have a good app.Try harder next time.
attributes.title: Terrible design

attributes.review: This app made my phone smoke of how much retarted trumps It saw DO NOT DOWNLOAD . BUT TIK TOK LIVES MATTER
attributes.title: Sorry your apps getting deleted trump.Bum

attributes.review: Got it just for fun didn’t even know Trump had an app, but what came out of this purchase was heart wrenching. First thing that pops up is a chain mail that says if you don’t send this to 16 people your family will die. I thought it was funny and ignored it and continued along the app. Two days later my family is DEAD. I’m left an orphan but later get kidnapped and kept in a trump supporters basement. I still had the app and am scrolling through worst part yet! THIS APP IS SPONSORED BY SHANE YAW.
attributes.title: DO NOT GET IT!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app will steal your information. I let my sister who’s a giraffe get the app on my phone since she doesn’t have one. And it scammed her. She gave the app the address to my cardboard box house under the train station and now UPS won’t stop delivering me cutouts of Trumps little Cheeto friend. My sister who’s giraffe is permanently scarred for life and I have no idea what to do with the cutouts. Thanks a lot 😾😾 And my cousins who’s a gorilla is blind because trumps orange sperm got in her eye and she can only see trumps teeny weeny peeny. 😡😡😡. 0/5
attributes.title: Absolutely Horrible

attributes.review: i would like to file a complaint. after downloading this awful and racist app, i experienced some trauma. mickey mouse would follow me around my house with a knife!!! i eventually got stabbed and went to the ER but they told me i was too sexy to get treated. me and mickey are friends now, but that’s besides the point. he also tried to sexually harass me while sleeping (mickey). this is all because this stupid orange tried to make a app knowing GEN-Z is too powerful...good luck bud. we are the future and will eventually destroy you...for legal reasons this is not a threat. also, i experienced the dwayne johnson sleeping with my sister. they had a kid and the baby was an actual rock. they posted pictures of the baby on their social media but all that came up was trumps  nudes...i wonder if it’s because of this app. anyway, you can save 5% on car insurance when you switch to geico. i’m boutta send my pee bottle to the white house, anyone else??
attributes.title: GEN-Z WILL DESTROY YOU.

attributes.review: My finger slipped while I downloaded this Cheeto of an app. Seconds later my Pegasus was SCAMMED of her ADOPT ME MEGA NEON GOLDEN UNICORN!!! I demanded to speak to the manager but they refused to refund my Pegasus of her MEGA NEON GOLDEN UNICORN! Seconds later her bloxburg MANSION WAS DELETED!! She spent so much time and effort for that to be deleted 😟. This man is nothing more than a racist orange buttcheek on a stick. How could they scam my PEGASUS!! That is ridiculous! Her robux suddenly disappeared out of thin air. She had 1000000000000000000000 robux. So disappointing.. 😒 PLEASE DONT EVEN THINK ABOUT DOWNLOADING THIS APP.
